item.title: Summary of Stegos AMA
item.description: Joel：Good day everyone and welcome! This is your chance to ask me all those questions that you may have been holding back. Ask me anything! Stegos is a native blockchain (not ERC20 token) that’s been designed to protect you from mass surveillance and let you send absolutely untraceable and anonymous payments and messages. It’s been a long road to mainnet, but I’m happy to announce that we’re near the end! We’re in the final stages of testing before the launch of our mainnet and desktop app.
